explanation: The arithmetic line used (c - d) but the intended operation is to add c and d. I fixed the single incorrect character (the minus) on that line so the program computes (a + b) * (c + d) instead of (a + b) * (c - d). Only that one line was changed.
fixed_code:
a,b,c,d=map(int,input().split())
print((a+b)*(c+d))
print('takahashi')# coding: utf-8
